CustomField.formula: IF( Lead_Score__c < 3, IMAGE('https://java-drive-3436-dev-ed--c.vf.force.com/resource/1662021157000/OneStar?','1'), IF( Lead_Score__c < 5, IMAGE('https://java-drive-3436-dev-ed--c.vf.force.com/resource/1662021249000/TwoStar?','2'), IF( Lead_Score__c < 7, IMAGE('https://java-drive-3436-dev-ed--c.vf.force.com/resource/1662021297000/ThreeStar?','3'), IF( Lead_Score__c < 9, IMAGE('https://java-drive-3436-dev-ed--c.vf.force.com/resource/1662021335000/FourStar?','4'), IMAGE('https://java-drive-3436-dev-ed--c.vf.force.com/resource/1662021405000/FiveStars?','5')))))
CustomField.label: Lead Priority
